body_html: When refactoring the test I noticed that this 2nd order grad test is pretty flaky. It's weird because the normal lstm test is more stable, but concat shouldn't really change anything in the gradient. On the other hand, I tried to find the bug, but couldn't really find it.
body_text: When refactoring the test I noticed that this 2nd order grad test is pretty flaky. It's weird because the normal lstm test is more stable, but concat shouldn't really change anything in the gradient. On the other hand, I tried to find the bug, but couldn't really find it.
body: When refactoring the test I noticed that this 2nd order grad test is pretty flaky. It's weird because the normal lstm test is more stable, but concat shouldn't really change anything in the gradient. On the other hand, I tried to find the bug, but couldn't really find it.
